rules_text:
Whenever a creature dies you may pay {BG}{WB} and create a 2/2 Black Demon Creature token.
Disturb {6}{W}{B}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)[/i]
special_text2:
Indestructible
When the last loyalty counter is removed from Tiamat, create a 20/20 Black, Green and White Legendary Dragon God creature token named Tiamat with Trample and Indestructible.   
[-1]: Destroy up to one target creature then then create a 4/4 Black  Horror creature token.
[-1]: Until end of turn, whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.
